str2: To search diligently, examine. Apparently from ereo; to seek, i.e. to investigate.

Prolonged from a primary kar; the heart, i.e. the thoughts or feelings; also the middle.

Thought, purpose, aspirations. From phroneo; inclination or purpose.

Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

str2: From en and tugchano; to chance upon, i.e. confer with; by extension to entreat.
Gen: in behalf of; acc: above.
Set apart by (or for) God, holy, sacred. From hagos; sacred.
A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
